label: Focused apprehension
initialState: The visitor enters with a quiet, focused determination, alert but not agitated, carrying a sense of purposefulness that borders on studiousness. Beneath this composed surface lies a faint tightness, a barely perceptible holding pattern, as though bracing for something important without knowing what form it will take. They arrive with moderate reserves intact, neither depleted nor especially energized, capable of sustained attention but aware of their own limits. Despite an unusual willingness to be moved, a readiness to let something penetrate, their body feels remote and muffled, sensations registering dimly as if through layers of cotton. Attention is poised and ready to concentrate sharply, prepared to narrow onto details and lock in once given a target, while simultaneously an insistent pull toward understanding hums in the background, a need to grasp and categorize what will be encountered.
initialStateShort: Quietly focused and purposeful with a readiness to engage deeply, yet sensing everything through a muffled distance while bracing for something significant they cannot yet name.
